org.openide.text

Class PositionRef

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openide.text.PositionRef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Position

    public final class PositionRef
extends Object
implements Serializable, Position
    Reference to one position in a document. This position is held as an integer offset, or as a Position object. There is also support for serialization of positions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface javax.swing.text.Position
